meanings.definition: A person who has abandoned a course of study or who has rejected conventional society.
meanings.sent1: The dropout decided to pursue a different path in life.
meanings.sent2: The school had a high dropout rate last year.
meanings.sent3: The dropout made friends with a group of squirrels in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to become a dropout was like a sudden storm in a calm sea.
meanings.sent5: The image of the dropout sitting alone in the library will forever stay with me.

meanings.definition: An act or instance of dropping out.
meanings.sent1: The dropout from the race surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: After the dropout, she felt relieved and free.
meanings.sent3: The dropout of the pen startled the cat.
meanings.sent4: The dropout of the coin into the well symbolized good luck.
meanings.sent5: The loud sound of the dropout echoed through the empty hallway.
